rooms.name: Collapsed Entrance Tunnel
rooms.description: A narrow stone corridor partially caved in, with old dwarven warning runes etched into the walls.

rooms.name: Hall of Echoing Anvils
rooms.description: A vast chamber filled with rusted anvils and long-silent forges. The air smells of soot and ancient metal.

rooms.name: Fallen Bridge Over Chasm
rooms.description: A deep chasm splits the room. A broken stone bridge hangs precariously, leaving only a narrow ledge to cross.

rooms.name: Abandoned Dwarven Market
rooms.description: Dust-covered stalls line the walls. Crates of cracked stoneware and broken tools remain where they were left centuries ago.

rooms.name: Crystal Lantern Grove
rooms.description: Bioluminescent crystals grow like lanterns from the floor and ceiling, casting shifting blue-green light.

rooms.name: Throne of the Deep King
rooms.description: A grand chamber with a broken obsidian throne. Ancient banners hang in tatters.

rooms.name: Sealed Ritual Vault
rooms.description: A circular stone room sealed with runic patterns. It is eerily quiet. This room is a dead end.

objects.name: Ancient Dwarven Hammer
objects.description: A heavy forge hammer, its grip worn smooth by centuries of use.

objects.name: Cracked Crystal Orb
objects.description: A palm-sized orb of crystal with faint inner light flickering like a dying ember.

creatures.name: Forgotten Iron Sentinel
creatures.description: A dormant dwarven automaton that sputters to life when intruders approach.

connects_to.description: A stout archway reinforced by dwarven engineering.
A cracked passage leading toward a deep chasm.
A perilous ledge carved along the cliff face.
Faint glowing crystals line the walls.
A stairway descending into royal chambers.
Ancient runes flicker faintly around the archway. This branch is a dead end.
